name: d3/recommended-modules-metapackage
description: our recommended modules for the OXID Shop

suggest.d3/ordermanager: Lassen Sie wiederkehrende Aufgaben automatisch nach frei definierbaren Regeln ausfÃ¼hren.
suggest.d3/disableadminelements: Hide unused menu items in the oxid eshop admin.
suggest.oxid-community/adminsearch: Search OXID admin globally for products, categories, clients, etc.
suggest.oxid-esales/twig-admin-theme: The admin theme for twig engine. NOTE! requires OXID >= 6.2.0
suggest.oxid-esales/twig-theme: Templates based on the twig engine. NOTE! requires OXID >= 6.2.0
suggest.oxid-projects/extended-order-administrat: Extended Order Admin module for OXID eShop.
suggest.oxid-projects/facebook-module: Facebook social plugins: Connect, Comments, Like, Invite, Facepile, Share.
suggest.oxid-projects/lexware-export-module: This module exports order information into an XML format.
suggest.oxid-projects/pdf-invoice-module: This is Invoice PDF module for OXID eShop.
suggest.oxid-projects/statistics-module: Logging and displaying statistics for OXID eShop.
suggest.oxid-projects/tags-module: This is a tags module for OXID eShop.
suggest.oxid-projects/captcha-module: This is Captcha module for OXID eShop.
suggest.vanilla-thunder/fix-phpmailer: Fix for OXID eShop: PHPMailer bug #751
suggest.proudcommerce/pcsummernotefix: Fixes summernote problem while saving content with smarty tags.
suggest.d3/oxid-sql-logger: [DEV] Returns all SQL queries into console of a Browser.
suggest.oxid-esales/module-generator: [DEV] Folders structure, empty classes and metadata generation for new OXID eShop modules.
suggest.oxid-esales/graphql-base: [DEV] A basic GraphQL implementation for the OXID eShop.
suggest.oxid-esales/smarty-to-twig-converter: [DEV] A Tool to convert smarty template engine to twig template engine.
